label: lem-potential-boundedness
name: Boundedness of the Fitness Potential

source.subsection: 12.2.1. Lemma: Boundedness of the Fitness Potential

natural_language_statement: For any alive walker $i$, its fitness potential $V_i$ is strictly positive and uniformly bounded. That is, there exist finite, state-independent constants $V_{\text{pot,min}}$ and $V_{\text{pot,max}}$ such that: $0 < V_{\text{pot,min}} \le V_i \le V_{\text{pot,max}} < \infty$ where the bounds are defined in terms of the global algorithmic parameters: $V_{\text{pot,min}} := \eta^{\alpha+\beta}$, $V_{\text{pot,max}} := (g_{A,\max} + \eta)^{\alpha+\beta}$, $g_{A,\max} := \log(1 + z_{\max}) + 1$
